page.title: 06HOUSING,WITHERNSEA
page.content: The oldest part of the town is dominated by terraced housing with slate roofs.The streets following the line of the beach are also mainly terraced,although the houses are fairly large and often of 3 storeys. Development has been rather hotch potch.The areas containing most of the detached houses are on the outskirts of the town on 3 newly developed estates,which give excellent views over the golf course or open agricultural land.These estates contain a mixture of houses,chalet bungalows and bungalows,both detached and semi-detached.Much of the housing is in private hands but there are 3 council estates,the largest containing 160 houses.Included within these estates are homes for the elderly, several of which are undergoing modernisation.
